info.narration: #0 is on their way to $0’s Containment Unit to begin the work process.

collection.name: Mountain of Smiling Bodies
collection.openText: The smiling faces are unfamiliar yet sorrowful.

specialTipSize.specialTip: When #0 died while working with $0, the Qliphoth Counter lowered.
When a wounded employee entered the Containment Unit, the Qliphoth Counter lowered.
When the work result was Bad, the Qliphoth Counter decreased.
When 10 employees die inside the facility, the Qliphoth Counter will lower. However, deaths caused by Execution Bullets were not recognized.
While $0 is escaping, it will show sensitive reactions to corpses. During suppression, ensure that no one dies due to the Abnormality; if casualties do happen, try to keep $0 away from the dead.
If $0’s suppression could not be completed on the previous level, you must be very careful to prevent any death inside the section where $0 is located.

After other entities spawned from $0’s main body while escaping, reducing its HP to 0 did not fully suppress it. $0 will only be quelled by attacking the main body after continuously reducing its HP and defeating the other spawned entities.
